questions.question: Write the output of runme to a file called runme.txt. What is the size in bytes of the resulting file??
Append the text 'HACKSUMMER21' to runme.txt. What is the MD5 hash of the file?
questions.feedback: If only there were sum command to create md5 hashes...

questions.question: Inside of runme.txt is a flag. Find it using grep and enter it here.
questions.feedback: What pattern do the flags follow?

questions.question: Somewhere on this system is a file called cmd03flag.txt. Find it and enter the flag.
